title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Polygon (POL) Gains 7.4%, as Index Trades Flat
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Sui (SUI) was also a top performer, gaining 6% from Tuesday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2805.5, down 0.0% (-0.17) since 4 p.m. ET on Tuesday.

Fourteen of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: POL (+7.4%) and SUI (+6.0%).

Laggards: AVAX (-2.0%) and NEAR (-1.0%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is trading flat with mixed individual performances (some gains, some losses) indicating overall market consolidation.
